Getting BRAP

BRAP 1.0 is the latest stable release. There are no known issues.

Dependencies

Both the client and server needs the brap-common package. The client also depend on Apache HttpClient.

Source code

You can browse the source at GitHub or do an anonymous checkout:

git clone git://github.com/polopoly/brap.git brap

You can also download the master branch of the source source as a tar or zip archive.
